comment.author: 47592210@N04
comment._content:
This is the Treasury Building between Macquarie and Davey Streets, on the same block as Franklin Square.

(Murray Street is now one way, so the horses coming up from the wharf would have to turn back.)

comment.author: 92747288@N03
comment._content:
Murray Street, Hobart.

Looking South-East towards Sullivan's Cove and the wharf.
